ee yojana thamayi: 1) bhikshun jiwithanthaya dakwa aaranya gatha wiya yuthuyi; 2) bhikshun jiwithanthaya dakwa pindu singa gena pamanak walandiya yuthuyi; 3) bhikshun jiwithanthaya dakwa panshukula chiwara pamanak dariya yuthuyi; 4) bhikshun jiwithanthaya dakwa gas yata pamanak wisiya yuthuyi; saha 5) bhikshun jiwithanthaya dakwa mas mansha nowaladiya yuthuyi kiyana panchawidha nithi.
kese wuwath pasu­giya jana­dhi­pa­thi­wa­ra­na­yen podu ape­kshaka maithri­pala siri­sena jaya gath da sitama depa­rshwaya athara siyum huya­kin bandunu eka­nga­tha­wak thibini.

ada (11) dina moratuwa katubadda pihiti karmika sanwardhana mandala parishraye di mema nawa gewathu waga eekakaya madhya sandaha handunwa dun athara ehi di adahas dakwu lanka karmika sanwardhana mandalaye sabhapathi upasena disanayaka mahatha pawasuwe mema jangama durakathana yedawumak magin palanaya kara haki swayankriya jala sayapum paddhathiyak sahitha gewathu waga eekakaya wanijawa nipadawimata amatharawa chandima prasad mahatha handunwa di athi jangama durakathana yedawumak magin palanaya kala haki swayankriya jala sapayum paddhathiya wanija wagawan, nagarika alankarana udyana aadiya sandaha yoda ganime hakiyawa soya balana lesa amathya wimal wirawansha mahatha thamata upades laba di athi bawayi.

widesha katayuthu amathi mangala samarawira, ajith pi perera, eksath jathinge shri lanka nithya niyojitha aacharya rohan perera, woshintan shri lanka thanapathi prasad kariyawasam chayarupawala wethi.
me pilibada adahas dakwana bandhanagara radawiyange ayithiwasikam surakime kamtuwe sabhapathi, nithignya senaka perera ‘dan prashnaya thiyenne mekayi.
eewa siyallama ekama deyak dakina dennekuta balapanne ekama widiyakin nowe.
sena widanagama chayarupa shilpiya ada kiyana kathawa:
mema kurullan laga sitina paddhathiya handuna chithraka thorathuru ha sapayuma athhituwana kali awashyathawa anuwa swayankriya kurullan laga sitina itu kala hakiya.
dan mathuwana sabama prashnaya wanne anduru sewanali athithayak athi kristiyan ha anagathayata muhuna dennata anastashiyata hakiweda yanna yi?
